name: sentiment analyzer
description: This Django-based app analyzes text to classify it as Positive, Negative, or Neutral using a pre-trained machine learning model. Users can input customer feedback or any text to receive real-time sentiment results. It's user-friendly, fast, and ideal for businesses, researchers, or anyone analyzing text tone.
